A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm a long time star wars fan and I took my young daughter along to watch this movie and we both absolutely loved it. 

I found it refreshing to have some of the old tropes shaken up a little and for me it breathed new life into the franchise. The actors delivered cracking performances\, but I particularly enjoyed Mark Hamill's Luke Skywalker - I can clearly see how he ended up where he did and he was fantastic.

Certainly not perfect but exciting and great fun to watch!
